(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Method 
          (MethodName 
            (Identifier "bar")) 
          (MethodParameters 
            (Identifier "a")) 
          (Statement 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "baz")))))))))))
